about_the_game:
[/url] Defiled Survivors is a medieval themed, action roguelite game that challenges you to defeat thousands of enemies and bosses in order to progress through enemy waves. As a player, you can choose from different characters, each with their own attributes and play styles. To enhance your character's abilities, you can select passive skills as you level up, purchase skill, items, and companions in game. The game requires you to move around the map, leveling up and choose right build to improve your chances of survival. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, and you'll face tougher enemies and bosses. Controls: Supports mouse, keyboard, controller

name: Defiled Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T8100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Slay the night creatures and save the church, you are the last hope! Defiled Survivors is a time survival medieval game with rogue-lite elements, where you choose your character's path and slay hundreds of enemies on your way.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, French, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
